Documentation.name: Extended UML Profile for XML Schemas
Documentation.notes: This profile defines additional stereotypes and tagged values used for defining XSD Schemas that follow the patterns used in XSD representations of GML Application Schemas. These extensions have been found useful in practice. Implemented for Enterprise Architect tool by Simon Cox, CSIRO Exploration and Mining. Tag.name: schematron
Tag.description: schematron rule (report or assertion) to be applied to this context

Stereotype.name: Leaf
Stereotype.notes: Model: Subset of model describing a schema. A leaf package shall not contain any other packages. XML implementation: All Leaf package contents or component classes are placed within one XML schema document.

Tag.name: xsdDocument
Tag.description: Relative path to XML Schema document corresponding to this package.

Stereotype.name: PrimitiveType
Stereotype.notes: Model: Defines a data type which does not support instance substitutability. The instances are not considered objects and shall therefore not have an identity, and may only appear as the type of class attributes or as the target of composition-associations. XML Implementation: Globally scoped XML Schema Type - may be complex (if generated using GML encoding rule) or complex or simple (if part of a Leaf package with canonicalXSD=true). Must *not* be derived (transitively) from AbstractGMLType or AbstractFeatureType.

Tag.name: byValuePropertyType
Tag.description: enforce the 'by value' property pattern without xlinks

Tag.name: isCollection
Tag.description: attribute group gml:AggregationAttributeGroup is added to the complex type of the feature type

Tag.name: xsdDerivation
Tag.description: class implemented as new type + element, or by applying constraints only

Stereotype.name: property
Stereotype.notes: Model: attribute or association role represents a 'property' of the containing class. XML implementation: local xsd:element, the type is either a property type (if the type is a complex type) or a simple type.

Tag.name: sequenceNumber
Tag.description: Specify position of attribute or association-end within content model implemented as an ordered sequence

Tag.name: inlineOrByReference
Tag.description: Constrain attribute or association-end to be implemented either inline or by reference only

Tag.name: isMetadata
Tag.description: flag that attribute or association-end is to be treated as metadata

Tag.name: noPropertyElement
Tag.description: suppress creation of local element definition - set true if no new property element is required because this property re-defines a property inherited from a parent, and the re-definition is handled by a constraint instead

Stereotype.name: multipleInheritance
Stereotype.notes: generalized class represents a 'property' of the containing class.

Tag.name: sequenceNumber
Tag.description: Specify position of attribute-group within content model implemented as an ordered sequence
